Articles.Content:
Hello !

I've been playing KSP for a few weeks now, I started a career game and was able to land on the Mun and Minmus and return. I'm currently building a space station and came to the forum to share game experience with you.

Also, I was wondering what the little flags in some people's signature were.

IceTDrinker

Welcome aboard IceTDrinker.

I see you already jumped to space!

So, where is you Space Station, show us your creations. (But put it on the right section, The Spacecraft Exchange! )

Good flights, missions and explosions. Enjoy the Forum with respect!
Thank you climberfx i'm on my way home, i'll post a few screenshot when i get back

The flags in peoples pictures if I'm thinking of what you are are mission ribbons... they are to showcase what they have accomplished in KSP. You can always put some in your signature for what you have done in KSP! Hope this answered your question and welcome to the forums and the exploration of spaaaaaaaace
Thx I.T Marcus you are right those are the ribbons I saw, how do you get those in you signature ?

Thx I.T Marcus you are right those are the ribbons I saw, how do you get those in you signature ?

Umm well I believe there is some ribbon generators floating around the forum but I'm not too sure. I think there may be a sem-official one on the website... however you can place them in your signature by creating them using the above mentioned and then inserting the picture of them as a image when you go to edit your signature

Hope this helps I would help you find an exact area you could go to for this but I'm posting via an xbox and am very limited in terms of speed and not being able to copy-paste links for you

Best of luck!
